notice.en: Graduate students have priority for enrollment, but the course does not count for graduate credits.Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade.Absentees for the first 2 classes will be withdrawn by the lecturer.
notice.ch: 研究生優先選課且免收學分費，但本課程不列入研究生畢業學分。分發條件:(1)全校碩博士生。(2)第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。(3)前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選學生。

remark.en: Graduate students have priority for enrollment, but the course does not count for graduate credits.Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade.Absentees for the first 2 classes will be withdrawn by the lecturer.
